description.value:
As your Sneak Attack grows more deadly, you can do more than just deal damage. Before rolling Sneak Attack damage dice on an attack, you can forgo rolling some of the Sneak Attack damage dice to add an effect to one target hit by the attack instead. If you have enough Sneak Attack dice to spend, you can apply multiple effects as part of one Sneak Attack.

Unless listed as indefinite, Cheap Shot conditions last until the end of the affected target’s next turn.

The conditions that you can apply, and the damage from your Sneak Attack needed to use it is shown below:

The target must make a Constitution (Save) check or become @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.PEDR1J13VZXKUF3C]{Stunned}

7d6

The target must make a Constitution (Save) check or become @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.OBTES08D2XC130IG]{Paralyzed}

 

The DC for this ability is: 

  • 8 + your proficiency modifier + half of the number of your Sneak Attack dice (minimum 1)
